ModInfo.description:
restricts each type of Bath to a specific City Biome (Cold, Temperate, Hot) requires Better AI Base DLL
Only 1 Bath can be built per city, all of them need to start with Apprentice Specialist. Cold Baths in Arid/Dessert Heated Baths in Tundra (enables Urban Improvements on Tundra) Warm Baths in Temperate regions.
Biome is calculated from non-Urban Land Tiles in City territory.
When using this together with the Less Scaling Specialist Yields mod, load this mod afterwards, otherwise you'd get the Specialist Train Time Discounts from the other mod.
(this is also part of FimMod)
